description: This file defines a React component 'DeviceList' that displays a list of devices with features such as search, filtering, sorting, pagination, and delete functionality. It interacts with external APIs and components to manage device data and user interactions.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Asynchronously loads device data from the API, updating state variables for device list, pagination, and server-side pagination flag.

methods.name: onDelete
methods.description: Handles device deletion, prompts user confirmation, calls delete API, shows toast notifications, and reloads data.
